      • listarMedalhasPais

        public static ListaLigada<Pais> listarMedalhasPais(ListaLigada<Pais> paises,
                                   ListaLigada<Prova> provas,
                                   int anoInicio,
                                   int anoFim,
                                   java.lang.String modalidade,
                                   Disciplina disciplina)
        Method to create a list of the medals obtained by the country.
        Parameters:
        paises - linked list of the countries.
        provas - linked list of the event.
        anoInicio - filter by year. The first year.
        anoFim - filter by year. The last year.
        modalidade - filter by sport.
        disciplina - filter by competition.
        Returns:
        a linked list with the all countries ordered by who wons more medals.
        See Also:
        country details., event details, sport details, competition details

      • historicoMedalhasPais

        public static ListaLigada<java.lang.Integer> historicoMedalhasPais(Pais pais,
                                                   ListaLigada<Pais> paises,
                                                   ListaLigada<Prova> provas,
                                                   ListaLigada<JogosOlimpicos> jogos)
        Method to calculate the number of medals by year.
        Parameters:
        pais - country to be calculated
        paises - linked list of countries
        provas - linked list of competitions with event
        jogos - linked list of event
        Returns:
        a linked list of integers with a number of medals by year

      • listarMedalhasAtleta

        public static ListaLigada<Atleta> listarMedalhasAtleta(ListaLigada<Atleta> atletas,
                                       ListaLigada<Equipa> equipas,
                                       ListaLigada<Prova> provas,
                                       int anoInicio,
                                       int anoFim,
                                       java.lang.String modalidade,
                                       Disciplina disciplina)
        Method to create a list of the medals obtained by the athlete.
        Parameters:
        atletas - linked list of the athletes.
        equipas - linked list of the team.
        provas - linked list of the event.
        anoInicio - filter by year. The first year.
        anoFim - filter by year. The last year.
        modalidade - filter by sport.
        disciplina - filter by competition.
        Returns:
        a linked list with the all athletes ordered by who wons more medals.
        See Also:
        athlete details, team details, event details, sport details, competition details

      • estatisticaPais

        public static java.lang.Object[] estatisticaPais(Pais pais,
                                 ListaLigada<Prova> provas,
                                 ListaLigada<Pais> paises)
        Calculate the statistics for one country.
        Parameters:
        pais - country to be calculated
        provas - linked list of events
        paises - linked list of countries
        Returns:
        return a array with the results of the country. The index 0 returns the number of editions in which he participated, index 1 returns the number of competitions in which he participated, index 2 returns the all-time gold medals earned, index 3 returns the all-time silver medals earned, index 4 returns the all-time bronze medals earned, index 5 returns the all-time ranking medals position, index 6 returns the average of medals earned by the country in the all editions
        See Also:
        country details, event details

      • medalhasGanhasRank

        private static int[] medalhasGanhasRank(Pais pais,
                       ListaLigada<Pais> paises,
                       ListaLigada<Prova> provas)
        Calculate the medals won by the country and the ranking for all editions
        Parameters:
        pais - country to be calculated
        paises - linked list of countries
        provas - linked list of competitions
        Returns:
        a array with the medals and the ranking of the country. The index 0 returns the all-time gold medals earned, index 1 returns the all-time silver medals earned, index 2 returns the all-time bronze medals earned, index 3 returns the all-time ranking medals position
        See Also:
        country details, competition details
